radiographic_examinations.findings: ECG revealed typical T wave alternans, markedly prolonged QT-intervals (RR = 570 ms, QT = 501 ms, QTc = 664 ms).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At the age of 5, the ECG showed slightly prolonged QTc (RR = 559 ms, QT = 346 ms, QTc = 462 ms).

radiographic_examinations.findings: Showed no congenital heart defects nor hypertrophy.
